Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to acquire certain private lands to be added to wilderness areas in the State of Texas.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to acquire specified lands for addition to the Upland Island Wilderness, Angelina National Forest; the Turkey Hill Wilderness, Angelina National Forest; and the Big Slough Wilderness, Davy Crockett National Forest, Texas. Requires such additional lands to be managed as wilderness. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to acquire certain private lands to be added to wilderness areas in the State of Texas.
